sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_4c9b3844db9bb200ded8b701ef961926
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>PE Remediation Actions Service</name><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  'use strict';

  function actionService() {
    var service = {
      getActions: getActions
    };
    return service;

    function getActions() {
      var actions = [{
        name: 'Rollback',
        iconClasses: 'fa fa-refresh',
        confidence: 98,
        duration: 10,
        change_request: 'CHG000123',
        href: 'https://www.example.com'
      },
      {
        name: 'Fix',
        iconClasses: 'fa fa-wrench',
        confidence: 76,
        duration: 30,
        change_request: 'CHG000123',
        href: 'https://www.example.com'
      },
      {
        name: 'Failover',
        iconClasses: 'fa fa-refresh',
        confidence: 35,
        duration: 90,
        change_request: 'CHG000123',
        href: 'https://www.example.com'
      }];
      return actions;
    }
  }

  angular
    .module('pe-remediation-actions')
    .service('actionService', actionService);
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-06 23:48:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4c9b3844db9bb200ded8b701ef961926</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PE Remediation Actions Service</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_4c9b3844db9bb200ded8b701ef961926</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-07 19:55:51</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
